page.title: 04Day In The Park Old Glossop
page.content: On the Saturday and Sunday of the first weekend in{July}Glossop people hold a{festival}in{Manor Park} called Day In The Park. The park is filled with stalls, displays and various activities. Local charities like the deaf and mentally handicapped have stalls selling plants, clothes,ornaments and toys. Other groups such as Friends of the Earth and Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament have displays. Local clubs such as playgroups, model railway club, and local artists have exhibitions. Groups such as the Pony Club and Scottish Dancing Club put on displays. In all there are more than{ {80}stalls. Refreshments are sold by the scouts. This year two special attractions were a wild west show and Japanese sumo wrestling.
